name: Assured Consulting Solutions
tag_list: government, it, management-consulting, defense, aerospace, civilian, intelligence-community
overview:
Assured Consulting Solutions enables their clients to align technology, organization and business strategy. Founded in 2011, Assured Consulting Solutions, LLC is an Economically Disadvantaged Woman-Owned Small Business (EDWOSB) operating in the DC-Metro area. Assured Consulting Solutions helps clients address the disconnect between IT and overall business strategy.

Their Strategic Innovation focuses performance and helps clients successfully navigate complex challenges by realizing data and technology solutions to meet business demands. They enable federal agencies and private sector firms to deliver strategic technology with real value within the current fiscal climate. Assured Consulting Solutions helps business leaders and executives develop and manage a business technology strategy from start to finish.

Assured Consulting Solutions generates business value for our clients through strategic innovation. Assured Consulting Solutions provides clients with the expertise and thought leadership required for successful project definition, end-to-end delivery and management. From the strategic thinking required during project start up, to ensuring that new systems and efficient processes are successfully deployed and adopted by an organization, Assured Consulting Solutions provides a consistent, rigorous and analytical approach to help clients meet their business goals. Under the umbrella of IT management consulting, Assured Consulting Solutions offers four key services: Assured Proposal Support, Assured Actionable Analytics, Assured IT Strategy, and Assured Project Management Solutions.

In conjunction with its system integration and data management practices, Assured Consulting Solutions partners with clients to reach their goals, solve complex information and data challenges, and generate real business value.

milestones.description: Announced hire of new Managing Partner, Ms. Mandy Parmer.
